factions.name: The Universities of Jol-Nar
factions.quote: We cannot halt progress for the sake of morality. If you have not the stomach for science, then I suggest you depart Wun-Escha immediately. -Doctor Sucaban

abilities.name: Fragile
abilities.description: Apply -1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

abilities.name: Brilliant
abilities.description: When you spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Technology' strategy card, you may resolve the primary ability instead.

abilities.name: Analytical
abilities.description: When you research a technology that is not a unit upgrade technology, you may ignore one prerequisite.

flagship.name: J.N.S. Hylarim
flagship.ability: When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces two additional hits

technologies.name: Spacial Conduit Cylinder
technologies.description: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation

technologies.name: E-Res Siphons
technologies.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods

factions.name: The Federation of Sol
factions.quote: Our enemies consider us children. They think us weak. Show them. Show them what the children of Jord can do!

abilities.name: Orbital Drop
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

flagship.name: Genesis
flagship.ability: At the end of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area

technologies.name: Spec Ops II
technologies.description: Upgraded infantry that hit on 6 and respawn in home system on 5

technologies.name: Advanced Carrier II
technologies.description: Upgraded carrier that moves 2, carries 8, and sustains damage.

factions.name: The Clan of Saar
factions.quote: O, Lisis, you whose fate is forever carved into the backs of the weary. Your spectre is all we see.

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Nomadic
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system

technologies.name: Floating Factory II
technologies.description: Upgraded Floating Factory: Move 2, Production 7, Capacity 5

technologies.name: Chaos Mapping
technologies.description:
Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships.

At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has PRODUCTION

factions.name: The Emirates of Hacan
factions.quote: There is no price too great for the Hacan, no silk too fine, and no war too long. My people will persevere. -Hacan Carth

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Trade' strategy card.

abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You can negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.

abilities.name: Arbiters
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of that transaction.

flagship.name: Wrath of Kenara
flagship.ability: After you roll a die during a space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

technologies.name: Quantum Datahub Node
technologies.description: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods. If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of his strategy cards.

technologies.name: Production Biomes
technologies.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

factions.name: The Naalu Collective
factions.quote: You insult me, ssskinling. Ze monstrosity you suggest-ze Druua, we are not capable of such cruelty. Purge zis madness from your mind and leave zis world. - Q'uesh Sish

abilities.name: Telepathic
abilities.description: At the end of the strategy phase, place the Naalu '0' token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain anotehr player's ships; move your ships from the active system into that system.

flagship.name: Matriarch
flagship.ability: During an invasion in this system, you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. After combat, return those units to the space area.

technologies.name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
technologies.description: Upgraded fighter hitson a 7 and counts as 1/2 ship towards fleet supply if over capacity.

technologies.name: Neuro-Glaive
technologies.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from his fleet pool and returns it to his reinforcemnents.

factions.name: The Winnu
factions.quote: We will claim what is ours by right, cousins. We will fulfill the destiny of those who came before us, and your treachery will not be forgotten. - Muad Di Faruuq

abilities.name: Blood Ties
abilities.description: You do not have to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: Reclamation
abilities.description: After you resolve a tactical action during which you gained control of Mecatol Rex, you may place 1 PDS and 1 Space Dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

flagship.name: Salai Sai Corian
flagship.ability: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

technologies.name: Lazax Gate Folding
technologies.description:
During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and beta wormhole.

ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

technologies.name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
technologies.description: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control until the end of your turn.

factions.name: The Yssaril Tribes
factions.quote: Clever Ssruu has met the offworlder and made it dead. What does the Guild want for Ssruu to meet next? -Ssruu

abilities.name: Stall Tactics
abilities.description: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Scheming
abilities.description: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Crafty
abilities.description: You can have any number of action cards in your hand. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

flagship.name: Y'Sia Y'ssrila
flagship.ability: This ship can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

technologies.name: Mageon Implants
technologies.description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand

technologies.name: Transparasteel Plating
technologies.description: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

factions.name: The Ghosts of Creuss
factions.quote: We do not mean to offend the honored ambassador. We mean only to imply that should his ship attempt to pass through the gate, it will not return. -Emissary Taivra

abilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
abilities.description: You treat all systems that contain either an alpha or beta wormhole as adjacent to each other. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system or in a system that contains either an alpha or beta wormhole.

abilities.name: Creuss Gate
abilities.description: When you create the game board, place the Creuss Gate where your home system would normally be placed. The Creuss Gate system is not a home system. Then place your home system in your play area.

flagship.name: Hil Colish
flagship.ability: This ship's system contains a delta wormhole. During movement, this ship may move before or after your other ships.

technologies.name: Wormhole Generator
technologies.description: At the start of the status phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

technologies.name: Dimensional Splicer
technologies.description: At the start of a space combatin a system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

factions.name: The L1Z1X Mindnet
factions.quote: You do not know the meaning of time. You do not comprehend the infinite. Your ignorance is surpassed only by your irrelevance. - Diplomat 2RAM

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet, replace each PDS and Space Dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Harrow
abilities.description: After each round of ground combat, your ships in the active system may use their BOMBARDMENT abilities against your opponent's ground forces on the planet.

flagship.ability: During a space combat, hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

technologies.name: Super-Dreadnought II
technologies.description: Upgraded Dreadnought bombards on 4, hits on 4, moves 2, and has capacity 2

technologies.name: Inheritance Systems
technologies.description: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

factions.name: The Yin Brotherhood
factions.quote: A-ah! You mistake me for a human; that we share the blood of Jord. I am no son of humanity. My life for the Yin! -Brother Milar

abilities.name: Indoctrination
abilities.description: At the start of a ground combat, you may spend 2 influence to replace 1 of your opponent's participating infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Devotion
abilities.description: After each space battle round, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

flagship.name: Van Hauge
flagship.ability: When this ship is destroyed, destroy all ships in this sytem.

technologies.name: Yin Spinner
technologies.description: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.

technologies.name: Impulse Core
technologies.description: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of his non-fighter ships if able.

factions.name: The Nekro Virus
factions.quote: The final step of all craft. The gate to eternity. A transcendency to a state of being that can only be described as godhood. -Mordai, The First

abilities.name: Galactic Threat
abilities.description: You cannot vote on agendas. Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

abilities.name: Technological Singularity
abilities.description: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponent's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player.

abilities.name: Propogation
abilities.description: You cannot research technology. When you would research a technology, gain 3 command tokens instead.

flagship.name: The Alastor
flagship.ability: At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

technologies.name: Valefar Assimilator X
technologies.description: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the 'X' assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

technologies.name: Valefar Assimilator Y
technologies.description: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the 'Y' assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead. While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text. You cannot place an assimilator token on a technology that already has an assimilator token.

factions.name: The Mentak Coalition
factions.quote: One people. One mind. One destiny. We will rise above the pit they have thrown us in. -Erwan Mentak, Founder of the Coalition

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyes in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of his ships.

abilities.name: Pillage
abilities.description: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, if he has 3 or more trade goods, you may take 1 of his trade goods or commodities.

flagship.name: Fourth Moon
flagship.ability: Other players' ships in this system cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

technologies.name: Mirror Computing
technologies.description: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or influence instead of 1.

technologies.name: Salvage Operations
technologies.description: After you win or lose a spae combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship in that system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat.

factions.name: The Barony of Letnev
factions.quote: Hold your fire until the main fleet arrives. Our armada will blot out their sun-when they die, they will die in darkness! -Baron Unlenn

abilities.name: Munitions Reserves
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may reroll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: Armada
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

flagship.name: Arc Secundus
flagship.ability: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD. At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship.

technologies.name: Non-Euclidean Shielding
technologies.description: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

technologies.name: L4 Disruptors
technologies.description: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON aginst your units.

factions.name: The Arborec
factions.quote: Do you hear flesh-thing? The harmonies of the Arborec? Your golems of metal and noise amd fore jave deafened you to the symphony. -Dirzuga Rophal

abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.description: Your Space Docks cannot produce Infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

flagship.name: Duha Menaimon
flagship.ability: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system.

technologies.name: Letani Warrior II
technologies.description: Upgraded Infantry that has PRODUCTION 2, hits on 7, respawns on 6.

technologies.name: Bioplasmosis
technologies.description: At the end of the status phase, you may remove any number of infantry from the planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

factions.name: The Embers of Muaat
factions.quote: No longer will the Gashlai be shackled by your whims. Be extinguished, now, and know that you have lost. -Fire Warden Umbat

abilities.name: Star Forge
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place either 2 fighters or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns.

abilities.name: Gashlai Physiology
abilities.description: Your ships can move through supernovas.

flagship.name: The Inferno
flagship.ability: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 cruiser in this unit's system.

technologies.name: Magmus Reactor
technologies.description:
Your ships can move into supernovas.

After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good.

technologies.name: Prototype War Sun II
technologies.description: Epic Cost 10 Move 3 War Sun

factions.name: The XxCha
factions.quote: To fight without cause is not the way, human. Curb your anger. Let us walk through the gardens and consider how to proceed. -Elder Qanoj

abilities.name: Peace Accords
abilities.description: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the 'Diplomacy' strategy card, you may gain control of 1 planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain any units and is in a system that is adjacent to a planet that you control.

abilities.name: Quash
abilities.description: When an agenda is revealed, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

flagship.name: Loncara Ssodu
flagship.ability: SPACE CANNON 5 (x3) - You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

technologies.name: Instict Training
technologies.description: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

technologies.name: Nullification Field
technologies.description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 otken from your stategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

factions.name: The Sardakk N'orr
factions.quote: Fear is death. Most of you will die. The Queen Mother thanks you for your worthy sacrifice. -G'hom Sek'kus

abilities.name: Unrelenting
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

flagship.name: C'Morran N'orr
flagship.ability: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

technologies.name: Exotrireme II
technologies.description: Upgraded Dreadnought: Hits on 5, move 2, capacity 1. After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system. Your choice.

technologies.name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
technologies.description: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.
